sentences.en: A cardiologist is a doctor who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 心脏病医生主要从事心脏疾病的测试和诊断.

sentences.en: A mechanic was removing a cylinder-head from the motor of a Harley motorcycle when he spotted a well-known cardiologist in his shop.
sentences.cn: 一位机械师正把气缸盖从一辆哈利摩托车的马达里移出，这时，他瞅见店里来了一位有名的心脏病专家。

sentences.en: AM Contrast Nephropathy: What the Interventional Cardiologist Should Know and Do?
sentences.cn: 对比剂肾病: 介入医师必须想到的和做到的是 什么 ?

sentences.en: Devon you're an adventure sports cardiologist.
sentences.cn: Devon你是一名冒险运动的热衷分子.

sentences.en: However, there will always be situations when assistance from a cardiologist will be needed and welcome.
sentences.cn: 当来自一位心脏病专家的帮助将被需要并且欢迎时,不过, 将有总情势.

sentences.en: In earlier research, cardiologist Ramin Farzaneh-Far, who led the new omega-3 study, helped show that telomere length can be a predictor of death risk in humans.
sentences.cn: 在早期研究中，领导新欧米伽-3研究的心脏病学家拉明·法察纳法尔帮助证明了染色体端粒长度可能会成为人类死亡风险的预报器。

sentences.en: Robert J . Myerburg, a cardiologist and professor of medicine at the University of Miami.
sentences.cn: 心脏学家迈阿密大学的医学教授罗伯特J迈尔伯格医生说.

sentences.en: That day, Larry's cardiologist called with test results from one of his first checkups.
sentences.cn: 那天拉里的心脏病专家医师从他的第一次检查结果得出，拉里需要紧急手术。

trans.tran_en: a doctor who studies or treats heart diseases
